mapper.insert: insert into xjhb_information (id, name, outlay, start_time, end_time, one_card_solution, proof_material, other_proof, project_application, person_id, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outlay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oneCardSolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proofMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherProof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectApplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update xjhb_information set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outlay = #{outlay,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, one_card_solution = #{oneCardSolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proof_material = #{proofMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_proof = #{otherProof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_application = #{projectApplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, outlay, start_time, end_time, one_card_solution, proof_material, other_proof, project_application, person_id, create_time from xjhb_information where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
